root.name: Cycle Warriors
root.description: OverviewCycle Warriors is a brawler/driving game developed and published by Tatsumi for the arcade platform.GameplayCycle Warriors gameplay is much like a brawler but instead of side scrolling on foot the game is played through a character riding a motorcycle traveling down the road. The goal in each level is to defeat the enemies along the way with a boos at the end.Attacks/MovesFlinging an enemyThere are two buttons used in Cycle Warriors. The first button performs an attack which can be used to attack an enemy on either side of the players character. The other button is used to jump. Enemies can be jumped on to damage them.A special attack can be performed by pressing both the jump and attack buttons at the same time.
